prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "'This Ain’t It, Chief' Updated To 'This Ain’t It, Noble Indigenous Tribal Leader'".
reference: U.S. - The popular internet comment response "This ain't it, chief," has been rightfully seen by many as problematic for years as it appropriates Native American culture in a derisive way, using the word "chief," which everybody knows is an offensive term. Native Americans have spent countless hours weeping since it was first coined.New Internet guidelines state that people must now say, "This ain't it, noble indigenous tribal leader." Leading social media platforms have already begun to implement an algorithm that automatically corrects the text any time a user types in the dated phrase. Experts say this will solve racism.The decision was arrived at after a recent Twitter user responded to a problematic tweet by saying, "this ain't it, chief" which led to another user responding, "This ain't it, CHIEF?! THIS ain't it, ch-- ch--" causing the software to meltdown, resulting in a momentary Twitter outage.Those who attempt to use the phrase in its out-dated format will be flagged and visited by the authorities.
candidate: In a stunning display of cultural sensitivity, the popular internet phrase "This Ain't It, Chief" has been officially updated to "This Ain't It, Noble Indigenous Tribal Leader." The change comes after months of intense debate and pressure from social justice activists who argued that the original phrase was a blatant display of disrespect towards Native American communities."We can no longer stand idly by while our sacred titles are used as mere slang on the internet," said Chief Running Bear, a prominent Native American leader. "It's time for the world to recognize the importance of our cultural heritage and show proper respect to our noble tribal leaders."The updated phrase has been met with widespread acclaim from the progressive community, who hailed it as a groundbreaking step towards a more inclusive and culturally aware society. "This is a momentous occasion," said Skylar Moonbeam, a self-proclaimed social justice warrior. "By updating this phrase, we are sending a powerful message that we will no longer tolerate the appropriation of indigenous cultures."However, not everyone is thrilled with the change. Some internet users have expressed frustration at the perceived policing of language. "What's next?" asked one disgruntled commenter. "Will we have to say 'This Ain't It, Your Majesty' when referring to European royalty?"Despite the backlash, proponents of the change remain steadfast in their commitment to cultural sensitivity. "It's a small price to pay for the sake of respect and inclusivity," said Chief Running Bear. "Plus, 'This Ain't It, Noble Indigenous Tribal Leader' just rolls off the tongue so much better."As the internet continues to evolve and adapt to the ever-changing landscape of social justice, one thing remains clear: the days of casually throwing around the title of "Chief" are officially over. From now on, it's "Noble Indigenous Tribal Leader" or nothing at all.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Using Our Prophetic Powers For Good: The Babylon Bee Will Now Only Write Articles About Positive Things Happening To Humanity".
reference: U.S. - Over the past few years, we have noticed a disturbing trend in our satire: it comes true. In the beginning, we thought it was just coincidence, but as the fulfilled prophecies continued to stack up, we came to accept the truth. We here at the Babylon Bee have been given the gift of prophetic vision, and it's time to use that spiritual gift for the good of mankind.It has therefore been decided that we will only make jokes about cool and good things so our future will be cool and good. Here are some of our headlines. Enjoy your new future!We have more, but that's probably enough goodness for now. We don't want to overdo it. You're welcome, world!
candidate: Title: "Using Our Prophetic Powers For Good: The Babylon Bee Will Now Only Write Articles About Positive Things Happening To Humanity"In a stunning turn of events, The Babylon Bee, known for its biting satire and uncanny ability to predict the future, has decided to use its powers for the greater good. Starting today, the satirical news site will exclusively focus on writing articles about the positive developments happening to humanity."We've realized that with great power comes great responsibility," said the Bee's Editor-in-Chief, Seth Dillon. "Instead of poking fun at the absurdities of modern life, we will now shine a light on the wonderful things that are making the world a better place."The Bee's team of prophetic writers has already begun crafting uplifting headlines, such as "World Peace Achieved After Twitter Argument Ends in Mutual Understanding" and "Cure for All Diseases Discovered in Essential Oils MLM Scheme." These articles are expected to bring hope and joy to readers across the globe."We believe that by focusing on the positive, we can manifest a brighter future for all," explained Senior Editor, Kyle Mann. "Our satirical powers have been honed to perfection, and now it's time to use them for the betterment of society."The Babylon Bee's decision has been met with overwhelming support from its readers, who have grown weary of the constant barrage of negative news. "Finally, a news source that will tell me everything is going to be okay," said one enthusiastic fan. "I can't wait to read about how climate change has been solved by a group of plucky kindergarteners."However, some skeptics have questioned whether the Bee's staff can maintain their trademark wit and humor while only reporting on positive news. In response, the Bee has assured its readers that they will continue to deliver the same quality content, just with a more optimistic spin.As the world eagerly awaits the Babylon Bee's first batch of uplifting articles, one thing is certain: the future looks bright, and the Bee will be there to report on it, one satirical headline at a time.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Study Finds Connection Between Wearing A Mask And Being A Big Sissy".
reference: U.S. - Studies have shown that wearing masks can help slow the spread of the novel coronavirus, but a new alarming study shows that wearing a mask has a downside: It greatly increases your chance of being a big sissy."The results are incredible," said sissiness researcher Winston Sullivan. "Someone could seem perfectly normal, but as soon as they put on a mask, you're all, 'Aww. Is the poor little guy scared of getting the flu?' Total wussification, as it's known in my field."According to the study, when some of the participants wore masks, Sullivan felt compelled to knock them to the ground and shout names at them. "And all they did in response," Sullivan explained, "was say, 'Is this part of the experiment?' What a bunch of dorks."Sullivan did say that in certain situations wearing a mask could not make you a sissy, such as if it were "part of an entire ninja ensemble." "But if you don't know kung fu," Sullivan said, "it definitely just makes you a big sissy."Sullivan did admit the masks were somewhat effective in keeping people from "infecting each other with the 'rona and dying and stuff," which is worth noting if "you're the sort of nerd who cares about that."
candidate: Title: Study Finds Connection Between Wearing A Mask And Being A Big SissyIn a groundbreaking study conducted by the Institute of Fragile Masculinity, researchers have discovered a shocking link between wearing a mask during a global pandemic and being a total wimp. The study, which surveyed thousands of individuals who prioritize their own comfort over public health, has conclusively proven that those who wear masks are nothing more than big, whiny babies."Our findings clearly show that real men don't wear masks," stated lead researcher, Dr. Chad Biceps. "If you're worried about catching a potentially deadly virus or spreading it to vulnerable populations, you might as well turn in your man card right now."The study also found that mask-wearers are more likely to engage in other sissy behaviors, such as washing their hands regularly, covering their mouths when they cough or sneeze, and showing empathy towards others. These findings have sent shockwaves through the scientific community, as well as the community of people who think that basic human decency is for losers."I always knew there was something off about people who wear masks," said local tough guy, Brock Slabchest. "It's like, what are you afraid of? A little virus? Grow a pair, you weaklings."In light of these findings, the Institute of Fragile Masculinity is urging all real men to ditch their masks and proudly display their bare faces to the world. They argue that the risk of contracting a highly contagious disease is a small price to pay for maintaining one's macho image.So, the next time you see someone wearing a mask in public, feel free to point and laugh at their cowardice. After all, nothing says "I'm a real man" like putting your own health and the health of others at risk for the sake of your own fragile ego.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Benny Hinn Travels To Dagobah To Master His Power To Knock People Over".
reference: DAGOBAH, OUTER RIM - Benny Hinn is one of the best-known miraculous healers in the galaxy. His powers are formidable -- but he hasn't yet completed his training. So, Hinn got in his private jet and flew to Dagobah to complete his training in the ways of the Force with Jedi Master Yoda."Reach your hand out you must and knock over that stump," said Yoda."I will try," Hinn replied."Do, or do not. There is no try.""Well, I mean, I'm just going to declare victory over it," Hinn explained."That is why you fail," Yoda replied.Yoda set up various training courses in the swamps of Dagobah, from training dummies Hinn would have to try to pickpocket to a whole line of dummies he would have to knock over with his mind.In one horrible training session, Hinn went into a dark cave and was confronted by John MacArthur. "NOOOOO!!!!" Hinn screamed, running for his life after he was unable to knock MacArthur down with his Force powers.Yoda shook his head and smacked Hinn with his cane. "Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.""Well, that all sounds pretty bad. But will I make a lot of money?""Oh, yeah, for sure," Yoda said."OK, cool," Hinn replied before pulling his private jet out of the swamp with his mind and flying back to his home planet.
candidate: Benny Hinn, the renowned televangelist known for his controversial "faith healing" practices, has recently announced his plans to travel to the distant planet of Dagobah in a bid to master his power to knock people over with a mere wave of his hand.Sources close to Hinn reveal that the preacher has been struggling to maintain his "divine" ability to send congregants flying backwards during his healing services. In a desperate attempt to regain his supernatural prowess, Hinn has decided to seek the guidance of Jedi Master Yoda, who is known for his mastery of the Force."I've tried everything," Hinn confessed in an exclusive interview. "I've even considered using hidden trampolines to launch people into the air, but that just doesn't have the same spiritual impact. I need to tap into the true power of the Force, and who better to learn from than Master Yoda himself?"Hinn's journey to Dagobah is expected to be a treacherous one, as he must navigate through the planet's dense swamps and confront his own inner demons. However, the preacher remains undeterred, believing that this pilgrimage will not only restore his ability to knock people over but also grant him new powers, such as the ability to levitate offering plates directly into his private jet.Critics have questioned the validity of Hinn's claims, pointing out that the Force is a fictional concept from the Star Wars universe and that Dagobah is not a real planet. Some have even suggested that Hinn's trip is merely a ploy to escape the increasing scrutiny surrounding his ministry's financial practices.Nonetheless, Hinn's followers remain steadfast in their support, with many expressing their eagerness to see the preacher return from his cosmic journey with a reinvigorated ability to send them sprawling across the stage.As Benny Hinn embarks on his intergalactic quest, only time will tell if the power of the Force will truly be with him, or if he'll simply be left floundering in a swamp, haunted by the ghost of his own hubris.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "White House Adds Cry Room For Fussy Reporters".
reference: WASHINGTON, D.C. - The Trump White House has added a new feature to the James S. Brady Press Briefing Room: a separate cry room for fussy reporters who are crying during press briefings and interrupting the proceedings.The quiet, serene room will allow news agencies to take their crying, wailing, fussy reporters into a separate space to calm them down so the press briefings can continue without interruption."If you notice one of your reporters starting to tear up, just take them into the cry room and soothe them before joining us again," said Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany. "There are pictures of Obama, bottles of kombucha, and some Tickle-You-Biden plushies in there to keep them occupied and help them feel safe.""Hey, wait a minute! Are you saying we're babies!?" shouted one reporter, tears welling up in his eyes."Well, yes," McEnany replied."That's... that's mean!" His lip began to quiver and he was forced to excuse himself to the cry room."WAAAAHHH!!!" cried Jim Acosta. "ORANGE MAN BAD! ORANGE MAN BAD!" One of his fellow CNN reporters cradled him in her arms and took him out into the cry room with an apologetic look on her face.The cry room may need expanding soon, however, since every single reporter except OANN's Chanel Rion was sent to the cry room during the first press briefing. Rion pointed and laughed at them as they went into the cry room, calling them "dumb babies," which made them cry harder.
candidate: White House Adds Cry Room For Fussy ReportersIn an unprecedented move to accommodate the delicate sensibilities of the press corps, the White House has announced the installation of a designated "Cry Room" for journalists who find themselves overwhelmed by the rigors of covering the current administration.The decision comes after numerous incidents of reporters bursting into tears during press briefings, unable to cope with the barrage of alternative facts and Twitter tirades that have become the hallmark of the current presidency. "We realized that we needed to provide a safe space for these fragile souls," said White House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany, "a place where they can retreat to when the truth becomes too much to bear."The Cry Room, located adjacent to the James S. Brady Press Briefing Room, features plush couches, soft lighting, and a soothing soundtrack of whale songs and ocean waves. Reporters will also have access to a selection of coloring books, stress balls, and a life-size cardboard cutout of former President Obama for those moments when they need a comforting hug.In addition to the Cry Room, the White House has also announced plans to provide reporters with "participation trophies" for attending press briefings, regardless of the quality of their questions or the accuracy of their reporting. "We want to make sure that every journalist feels valued and appreciated," said McEnany, "even if they're just here to push their own biased agenda."The move has been met with mixed reactions from the press corps. Some have praised the White House for its compassionate approach to dealing with the emotional needs of reporters, while others have criticized the move as a patronizing attempt to infantilize the media.Regardless of the reaction, one thing is clear: with the addition of the Cry Room, the White House has once again proven its commitment to creating a nurturing environment for the most delicate snowflakes in the media landscape.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Children Threaten To Help".
reference: MAPLE BLUFFS, IA - Justin Daniels was painting the kitchen, already working hard to not drop paint on anything where paint didn't go, when a further complication was added: His five-year-old and three-year-old sons expressed a desire to help."I knew instilling in my children a desire to help others was going to come back to haunt me," Daniels told reporters. "I mean, can you imagine? It would take at least twice as long and I'd be cleaning paint off the counters for days."Daniels tried to come up with some menial tasks for the kids, such as putting painter's tape on things that didn't particularly need it, but the children insisted on helping with the core task of painting."That's when I came up with a brilliant idea," Daniels said. "I told them I was so happy that they were such good children who wanted to help that I'd reward them with a new video game. It cost me sixty bucks, but it took away any desire they had to help anyone with anything."With the children playing their new video game, Daniels was able to paint in peace, other than his kids occasionally screaming at each other.
candidate: Title: "Children Threaten To Help"In a shocking turn of events, children across the nation have banded together and issued a chilling ultimatum to their parents: "Let us help, or else." The sudden surge of altruism among the younger generation has left many adults baffled and, frankly, terrified."I just wanted to watch my favorite TV show in peace," said a visibly shaken mother of three, "but then my kids burst into the room, demanding to do the dishes and fold the laundry. I didn't know what to do!"Reports of unsolicited assistance have been pouring in from households everywhere. Children as young as four have been spotted eagerly setting the table, while teenagers have been caught red-handed mowing the lawn and cleaning their rooms without being asked.Experts are scrambling to understand this unprecedented phenomenon. "We've never seen anything like it," said Dr. Ima Skeptic, a renowned child psychologist. "Normally, getting kids to help around the house is like pulling teeth. This sudden change in behavior is both astonishing and deeply unsettling."Parents are now living in constant fear of their children's next act of kindness. Some have even resorted to hiding from their own offspring, just to avoid being bombarded with offers of assistance."I had to lock myself in the bathroom for hours," confessed one father, who wished to remain anonymous. "Every time I stepped out, my kids were there, begging to help with the grocery shopping or to wash the car. It's a nightmare!"As the situation escalates, the government is considering declaring a state of emergency. "We cannot allow this threat of helpfulness to continue unchecked," warned a high-ranking official. "If we don't act now, we could soon find ourselves living in a world where children are contributing members of society. And that, my friends, is a risk we simply cannot take."In the meantime, parents are urged to remain vigilant and to report any suspicious acts of kindness to the authorities immediately. Remember, if your child offers to help, it's not a gesture of love and respect – it's a threat that must be dealt with swiftly and decisively.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Trump Replaces Washington Monument With Giant Can Of Goya Beans".
reference: WASHINGTON, D.C. - Liberals have been complaining about the Washington Monument, which is named after the notorious racist George Washington. Well, Trump is now appeasing them, having taken down the century-old obelisk, replacing it with a 350-foot-tall can of Goya pinto beans.The authentic Goya can is 350 feet tall and 200 feet wide and contains 82,252,607 gallons of beans."This is the largest can of Goya beans, maybe ever," said President Trump at the dedication ceremony. "Way bigger than some of the other countries' statues and monuments. This thing makes the Eiffel Tower look laughable. I mean that literally. You look at the Eiffel Tower and you just laugh. It's not even finished. You can still see the frame. And does it have beans? Well, maybe at that snooty French restaurant. But probably not. Probably not. They just have dumb French food like cheese with funny names and bread. Admittedly the bread smells pretty good, but it doesn't live up to that when you eat it. Always smells better than it tastes. Everyone says so."Liberals tried to criticize the move but were unable to do so since they would be siding with George Washington. Plus, the optics of tearing down a monument to a Latino businessman would just be bad. "We've been played again," said Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi. "This guy really is a genius."
candidate: Title: Trump Replaces Washington Monument With Giant Can Of Goya BeansIn a stunning move that has left the nation reeling, President Donald Trump has announced his decision to replace the iconic Washington Monument with a colossal can of Goya beans. The decision comes on the heels of the President's recent endorsement of the company's products, which sparked controversy and accusations of ethical violations.During a press conference held at the base of the soon-to-be-demolished monument, Trump declared, "The Washington Monument is old news, folks. It's time for something new, something tremendous, something that represents the true greatness of America. And what better way to do that than with a giant can of the best beans in the world, Goya beans?"The President went on to explain that the new structure, dubbed the "Trump Tower of Beans," will stand at an impressive 555 feet tall, surpassing the height of the original monument by a whopping 5 feet. The exterior of the giant bean can will feature a gold-plated finish, emblazoned with the President's name in massive lettering.Critics have been quick to condemn the decision, with many calling it a blatant abuse of power and a shameless attempt to promote a company that has faced backlash for its CEO's support of the President. Others have questioned the structural integrity of a monument made entirely of bean cans, citing concerns about its ability to withstand the elements and potential bean spillage.In response to these criticisms, Trump dismissed his detractors as "bean-hating losers" and assured the public that the new monument would be "the most beautiful, most stable bean tower in the history of the world." He also hinted at plans to replace other national landmarks with giant food items, including the Lincoln Memorial with a massive tub of Kentucky Fried Chicken and the Statue of Liberty with a towering bottle of Diet Coke.As construction begins on the Trump Tower of Beans, Americans are left to wonder what the future holds for their beloved national monuments and whether they, too, will fall victim to the President's whims and questionable taste in architectural design.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Hack Suspected As Biden Posts Complete, Coherent Thought On Twitter".
reference: U.S. - Hackers have been blamed as Joe Biden posted a complete, coherent thought on Twitter earlier today.As soon as Twitter support saw that Biden had posted several complete sentences in a tweet, they immediately locked his account down, suspecting a hack."The full, rational sentences were a dead giveaway," said a Twitter IT guy. "If you're gonna pretend to be Joe Biden, you have to add in several rambling asides, some made-up words, and three or four major gaffes. It clearly wasn't him, so we took steps to lock down his account.""Hackers, you know, thhhhe--the thing that, that hacks--hackers are dangerous," said Joe Biden in a statement to the press. "Back in my day, hackers were the guys who would cut down your telegram wire and listen in on the ol' party line. My cousin, Velma, she once said..." At this point, he abruptly fell asleep.Meanwhile, President Trump's account posted several deranged rants about random stuff, assuring everyone that his account had not been compromised.
candidate: Hack Suspected As Biden Posts Complete, Coherent Thought On TwitterIn an unprecedented turn of events that has sent shockwaves through the political world, President Joe Biden has allegedly posted a complete and coherent thought on his official Twitter account. The tweet, which contained a well-structured sentence free of gaffes or confusion, has led many to suspect that the President's account has been hacked by an unknown entity.The tweet in question read, "Today, we stand united as a nation, working together to build a brighter future for all Americans." The message, which was posted at 9:37 AM EST, has since been shared over 100,000 times and has garnered widespread attention from both supporters and critics alike.White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre addressed the concerns during an emergency press briefing, stating, "We are currently investigating the possibility of a security breach on the President's Twitter account. The tweet in question does not align with the President's usual style of communication, which is known for its endearing quirks and unique interpretations of the English language."Sources close to the administration have revealed that an elite team of cybersecurity experts has been assembled to determine the origin of the uncharacteristic tweet. One insider, who wished to remain anonymous, stated, "We've never seen anything like this before. A clear, concise message from the President's account? It's unheard of. We're working around the clock to get to the bottom of this."The news has sent ripples through the political landscape, with many wondering about the implications of such a development. Senator Mitch McConnell (R-KY) expressed his disbelief, saying, "If the President is indeed capable of expressing himself in a coherent manner, it could change the entire dynamic of our political discourse. We may need to reevaluate our strategies moving forward."Meanwhile, supporters of the President have celebrated the tweet as a sign of growth and improvement. One enthusiastic Biden fan, who goes by the Twitter handle @BidenBro1946, wrote, "I always knew he had it in him! This is the turning point we've been waiting for. #BidenBrilliance."As the investigation into the alleged hack continues, the nation remains on edge, wondering if this marks a new era in presidential communication or if it is merely a fleeting anomaly in the ever-unpredictable world of politics. Only time will tell if President Biden will continue to surprise us with moments of clarity or if we will return to the comforting familiarity of his trademark verbal adventures.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Kanye West Drops Out Of Race After Elon Musk Offers Him Position As President Of Mars".
reference: LOS ANGELES, CA - Kanye West has dropped out of the presidential race, several sources confirmed today, after Elon Musk offered to instead make him president of Mars."America is great and all, but being president of Mars would be the greatest of all time," West said. "Of all time."Musk said he had a great conversation with West where he convinced him not to aim too low but instead to "shoot for the stars.""Kanye has way more potential than just being president of America," Musk said. "Frankly, being president of the U.S. is beneath him. Mars is where it's at. It will be way better than any government on this planet."West then showed Musk his crude drawings for a rocket ship to Mars he'd designed in his spare time, called the Yeezymobile. The Yeezymobile is made of "space metal" and runs on Chick-fil-A peanut oil: a "100% environmentally friendly" design, according to West."And that big fin on the back adds at least 1,000 horsepower," West said."I love this guy's enthusiasm," said Musk as he looked over the drawing. "We'll have to make a few changes so the craft will obey the laws of physics, but this is a great start. Hey, who are those two stick figures in the front?""That's me and you, Musk. Me and you," West said, looking up at the stars and putting his arm around his entrepreneurial friend. "We are gonna be the kings of the universe, my friend. The kings of the universe."
candidate: Kanye West Drops Out Of Race After Elon Musk Offers Him Position As President Of MarsIn a shocking turn of events, rapper and presidential hopeful Kanye West has announced his withdrawal from the 2020 U.S. presidential race. The decision comes after tech billionaire Elon Musk offered West the coveted position of President of Mars.Sources close to West reveal that the rapper was initially hesitant to accept the offer, citing his deep commitment to solving Earth's problems. However, after a series of secret meetings with Musk, West was convinced that his unique vision and creative genius were better suited for the Red Planet."Kanye realized that Earth was just too small for his ideas," an insider told us. "He needed a blank canvas, a fresh start, and Mars provided just that. Plus, he was really excited about the prospect of designing his own space sneakers."Musk, who has been vocal about his plans to colonize Mars, expressed his enthusiasm for West's decision. "Kanye is exactly the kind of forward-thinking, innovative leader we need on Mars," Musk said in a statement. "His experience in music, fashion, and now politics makes him the perfect candidate to lead the first human settlement on another planet."West's departure from the presidential race has left his supporters both on Earth and in the cosmos in a state of shock. Some have even suggested that they would be willing to relocate to Mars just to continue supporting their favorite candidate.As for West's political rivals, they seemed somewhat relieved by the news. "I mean, I'm not saying I'm happy he's leaving Earth," said one anonymous candidate, "but I'm not exactly sad about it either."While details of West's plans for Mars remain unclear, sources say that the rapper has already begun work on a new album inspired by his upcoming interplanetary adventure. Rumored tracks include "Red Dust in the Wind," "Life on Mars (feat. David Bowie's Ghost)," and "Stronger (Gravity Remix)."As the world comes to terms with this unexpected development, one thing is certain: the 2020 presidential race just got a little less entertaining, and the future of Mars just got a whole lot more unpredictable.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "More People Voluntarily Committing Themselves To Asylums To Escape Insanity Of Real World".
reference: U.S. - More people are voluntarily committing themselves to mental institutions in an attempt to escape the ever-increasing insanity of the real world.Thousands of people have checked themselves in at psychiatric wards across the country, claiming to be insane, in order to get away from the absolute insanity of everything that's happening outside."Oh yeah, I'm totally crazy, 100%," said Frank Zwygart as he checked himself in to an asylum in Arkham. "I think I'm Napoleon Bonaparte or whatever. Yep, totally insane.""That guy over there swinging the golf club at the orderly thinks we're living in a simulation, while Bob over in the corner thinks he's God," said recently committed man Frank Zwygart. "So yeah, it's a little less crazy than things out there. We don't worry about stuff like Kanye running for president, murder hornets, nunchuck bears, bubonic squirrels, World War 3, or getting doxxed for old tweets. And they've got lots of great board games in here.""Plus, Bob's actually a pretty cool guy once you get to know him," he added as he adjusted his straitjacket. "Actually, he's totally sane -- his beliefs make perfect sense to him. There's an internal logic to everything he believes, unlike some of the crazies you try to talk to out there in the crazy world."
candidate: In a shocking turn of events, mental health facilities across the nation are reporting an unprecedented surge in voluntary commitments as people desperately seek to escape the ever-increasing insanity of the real world. The once-stigmatized asylums are now being hailed as sanctuaries of sanity amidst the chaos of modern society."I just couldn't take it anymore," said 35-year-old marketing executive, Sarah Thompson, as she checked herself into the Serenity Pines Mental Retreat. "Between the endless social media drama, the absurdity of politics, and the constant barrage of doomsday news, I realized that the only way to maintain my sanity was to leave it all behind and commit myself to a place where straightjackets are considered fashionable."Asylum directors are scrambling to accommodate the influx of sane individuals seeking refuge from the outside world. "We've had to convert our group therapy rooms into luxury suites and replace our cafeteria's bland food with gourmet meals to cater to our new clientele," said Dr. Robert Stevens, director of the Tranquility Heights Asylum. "It's a far cry from the days when we had to convince people that our padded walls were actually for their own safety."Experts are attributing this newfound appreciation for mental institutions to the realization that the real world has become far more unhinged than any psychiatric ward. "When you have people arguing over the color of a dress on the internet, politicians making decisions based on Twitter polls, and people eating Tide Pods for fun, it's no wonder that the sane are seeking solace in the company of the clinically insane," said sociologist Dr. Emily Reeves.As the trend continues, some are concerned that the exodus of rational individuals from society may have unintended consequences. "If all the sane people are locked away in asylums, who will be left to keep the rest of the world in check?" pondered philosopher Dr. Marcus Thompson. "We may be heading towards a future where the inmates are literally running the asylum."Only time will tell if this unconventional approach to mental wellness will have a lasting impact on society. For now, those seeking a break from the insanity of the real world can rest assured that there's always a padded room waiting for them at their nearest asylum.
